modName: Just for Fun CM PUNK by NEO
summary:
Just for FUN!!!
Add New Clothing, of A famous Wrestler CM PUNK.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=yellow][size=15]Just For Fun CM Punk by Neo[/size][/color][/b]

Author : Meister aka Neovinci

=================================================================================

Add New Clothing, of A famous Wrestler CM PUNK. 

This is a joke mod, just for fun, originally it made as a personal gift for my friend Mike(not \"M\'aiq\" just \"Mike\").

So please don\'t blame me related to Lore-firendly or etc.


-The Poach located in Rverwood has clothing only.

-but if you want to get armour type, you can craft them with \"Steel perk\" you got or will get.

-All Armours are also temperable.



There is possibility contorted unnaturally with some active poses.

Use 7z tool, Unzip and Drag into DATA folder where your Skyrim is installed.

(..STEAM/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data)

It is an exceptional to my usual mod making, and I will not take any request related to this kind of mod(s).
I hope you understand it.


=================================

[b][color=yellow]Locaton :[/color][/b] In a Pouch, near by a woodpile, Riverwood(as screenshot)

[b][color=yellow]Requirement :[/color][/b] Calientes Female Body (for CBBE users - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666)
[b][color=yellow]Recommend :[/color][/b] CBBEv3M Body Repalacer by MAK03 (for CBBE users - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13180)

[b][color=yellow]Requirement :[/color][/b] DIMONIZED UNP female body (for UNP users - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709)

=================================================================================

[b][color=yellow]Credit[/color][/b]

thanks to

Betheada for this wonderful land.

Caliente for nice CBBE Female Body

MAK07 for CBBEv3M Body Repalacer

dimon99 for DIMONIZED UNP female body

Halofarm for wonderful pose mod \"Pinup Poser\"

My Friend Mike Van\'t Hof Jr.

CM Punk

Blender developers

Members of \'NAVER ElderScrolls7\' cafe for useful tips and tutorials

Members of \'Naver Escroll\' cafe

TESNEXUS Staff membership and many Nexus friends 


=================================================================================

[b]You can do whatever with it for personal usage. 
It\'s not free for other\'s Conversion, neither Upload on any other sites.
Do not upload anywhere include Steam workshop without my Permission.
If You want it, Send A PM or Mail to Me.[/b]
author: Meister aka Neovinci
